mapper.insert: insert into uploadfile(uno, boardno,utitle, originalname, storedname, usize, udate, id, delfile) values (uploadfile_seq.nextval, 0, #{utitle}, #{originalname},#{storedname}, #{usize}, sysdate, #{id}, 'n')
mapper.select: SELECT uno, boardno,utitle, originalname, storedname, usize, udate, id, delfile FROM uploadfile WHERE delfile = 'n' ORDER BY udate desc
SELECT storedname, originalname, utitle FROM uploadfile WHERE UNO = #{uno}
mapper.update: update uploadfile set boardno= #{boardno} where UNO=#{uno}
mapper.select: select * from uploadfile where boardno =#{boardno} ORDER BY udate desc
select uno, utitle, originalname, usize, to_char(udate, 'yyyy/mm/dd') udate, id from uploadfile
